date.description: Date and time in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (KST) (required for rapid development tracking)

timestamp.description: Timestamp in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (KST) (alternative to date field)

kind.description: High-level assessment kind (e.g., run_log, incident_summary, ab_regression, visual_analysis)

template_id.description: Template identifier from .templates/assessment_templates.json used to generate this assessment
